name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Bounces
description: This is a repository of bounces APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: SendGrid
apis.description: Delivering your transactional and marketing emails through the worlds largest cloud-based email delivery platform. Send with confidence.

apis.name: Dyn
apis.description: Dyn is home to the worlds most trusted DNS product suite and the worlds most reputable Email Deliverability Service.

apis.name: Elastic Email
apis.description: Elastic Email is an all-in-one email delivery platform. Send beautiful newsletters or transactional emails in a better way.

apis.name: Mailgun
apis.description: Mailgun provides a web service for integrating email inboxes into apps. Providing APIs for sending, receiving, and storing APis, including tools for managing delivery, real-time integration, organizing, routing, and tracking on emails. Malign provides a free trial to learn about services, and pay as you go, unit based pricing to continue from there, including volume pricing for increased usage.

apis.name: Postmark
apis.description: Trusted by thousands of developers, Postmark is a fast and reliable transactional email service. Send with Postmark to ensure your transactional emails get to the inbox on time, every time.

apis.name: AWS Simple Email Service
apis.description: Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES) is a cost-effective email service built on the reliable and scalable infrastructure that Amazon.com developed to serve its own customer base. With Amazon SES, you can send and receive email with no required minimum commitments – you pay as you go, and you only pay for what you use.

apis.name: Dezrez
apis.description: Cloud based estate agent software , sales & letting agent software, estate agent website design and property management software - Dezrez  Services
